entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the potions master who marks Harry's potion. He is described as watching Harry with 'a look of gloating pleasure' when Harry's potion sample breaks.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student who gives a 'gleeful yell of laughter' after Snape watches Harry's potion break.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to get an E on his potion. He is described as being 'incensed' and 'too angry to speak' when his potion breaks.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who apologizes to Harry for accidentally clearing up the rest of his potion. She says she thought Harry had finished with it.

relationships.description: Snape watches Harry's potion break and seems to be enjoying the situation.
Malfoy laughs after Snape watches Harry's potion break.
